channel.title: Did I well understood ? No requirements explained then Only 64bits and only usable in VM ?
channel.description:
Hi,
I just discovered Whonix by reading its website explanations. But ... 1) I did not found any requirements hardware explanations so I do not know if I 2) can just be used on a 64bits computer. Am I right ? and... 3) can only be used as a Virtual Machine then not as a full host installation on a computer. Am I right ?
Sincerely thank you for your answers.
Have a nice day.

item.title: Did I well understood ? No requirements explained then Only 64bits and only usable in VM ?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
miguipda:

did not found any requirements hardware

Whonix

System Requirements

Whonix ™ System Requirements

miguipda:

can just be used on a 64bits computer.

No download version. Build from source code might work.

miguipda:

can only be used as a Virtual Machine then not as a full host installation on a computer. Am I right ?

More. Physical isolation, RPi, host operating system upcoming. Full list will be here always:
